title: [Large-scale] AI Literacy Instructional Design Expert Training Program for Elementary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory, understanding of constructivist approaches, and elementary education environment experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in designing AI literacy education linked to mathematics curriculum, implementing collaborative learning in BYOD environments

learning_goals: They can design an AI literacy education framework suitable for the elementary education level (conceptual understanding, ethical problem-solving, data analysis).

Learners will design two educational scenarios related to AI model development (image classification or natural language processing) using constructivist and project-based learning strategies, achieving over 80% suitability scores in peer evaluations and expert reviews.

Learners will design three types of formative assessments (diagnostic/process/feedback) using AI tools (intelligent agents, ChatGPT, etc.) in math curricular contexts (functions, calculus, etc.), establishing a system that achieves over 80% suitability through peer evaluations and expert reviews.

resources: AI Education Platform (e.g., Machine Learning for Kids)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
